author: haberturk.com
title: Ground News - THE BLACK WINTER HAS ARRIVED! Breaking news: Torrential rain and snowfall alert from Meteorology! Warning arrived in a row - Weather for March 22
text:
Summary by haberturk.com Breaking news... Meteorology issued an orange warning for Bitlis, Van, Şırnak and Hakkari, and yellow for 9 provinces. According to the weather forecasts, the south of Marmara, the interior of the Aegean, the Mediterranean and the Black Sea, the regions of Central Anatolia and Eastern Anatolia will be snowy, and the coastal parts of Southeast Anatolia, the Mediterranean Sea and the Black Sea will be rainy. Rainfall is expected to be very strong … Share menu 0 Articles 0 Articles All Left Center Right
